PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05572017-06-01,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ISED
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission - Telecom Decision CRTC 2017-56
PrecisOrder Referring back the CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSIONS' (CRTC) TELECOM DECISION CRTC 2017-56 to CRTC for reconsideration and hearing in order to have the CRTC consider whether broadening the definition of “home network” to include other forms of connectivity, like Wi-Fi, could have a positive impact on the affordability of retail mobile wireless services in Canada without significantly negatively impacting the existing carriers’ incentives for investment.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
